_source.text: 18. Sierra-Johnson J, Fisher RM, Romero-Corral A, Somers VK, Lopez-Jimenez F, et al. (2009) Concentration of apolipoprotein B is comparable with the apolipoprotein B/apolipoprotein A-I ratio and better than routine clinical lipid measurements in predicting coronary heart disease mortality: findings from a multi-ethnic US population.

text: ) Concentration of **apolipoprotein** **B** is comparable with the **apolipoprotein** **B**/**apolipoprotein** A-I ratio and
**better** **than** routine clinical lipid measurements in predicting coronary heart disease mortality: findings from a multi-ethnic US population.
